content.raw:
I updated pipelines to use the ign-cmake PR and this is having difficulties with ign-msgs. It's installing `libignition-msgs-dev:amd64 (1.0.0~pre3-1~xenial)`, and fails with:

~~~
CMake Error at /usr/local/lib/cmake/ignition-cmake0/cmake0/IgnUtils.cmake:734 (target_link_libraries):
  Error evaluating generator expression:

    $<TARGET_PROPERTY:ignition-msgs1,INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES>

  Target "ignition-msgs1" not found.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /usr/local/lib/cmake/ignition-cmake0/cmake0/IgnUtils.cmake:834 (ign_build_executables)
  src/CMakeLists.txt:29 (ign_build_tests)
~~~
content.html:
I updated pipelines to use the ign-cmake PR and this is having difficulties with ign-msgs. It's installing libignition-msgs-dev:amd64 (1.0.0~pre3-1~xenial), and fails with:

CMake Error at /usr/local/lib/cmake/ignition-cmake0/cmake0/IgnUtils.cmake:734 (target_link_libraries):
  Error evaluating generator expression:

    $<TARGET_PROPERTY:ignition-msgs1,INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES>

  Target "ignition-msgs1" not found.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /usr/local/lib/cmake/ignition-cmake0/cmake0/IgnUtils.cmake:834 (ign_build_executables)
  src/CMakeLists.txt:29 (ign_build_tests)
